tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ
comments: Worst teacher ever. Assigns a group project and paper... as if college students have the time to work on a group paper. Class attendance is mandatory although everything she lectures is useless. Just read the book because all of her test questions come from the book, as do her lectures. Even the smartest students are just passing her class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: wanna a class that you can slack off and pass with a C? take her. all her lectures are online, all classwork is online, just come to class for the exams. book is useless and expensive.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is incredibly difficult to understand. In addition the quizzes and tests are extremely hard, and full of questions that she never teaches or goes over. Don\'t even bother paying attention in the lectures because nothing discussed in class will be tested on.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Quite possibly the worst professor on the planet. She can barely speak english, which by itself wouldn\'t be bad, but she can also barely teach. She doesn\'t make her quizzes, they are from another school where I\'m assuming the professor actually teaches the curriculum. Midterms and final are easy if you spend all day reading the book.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: directly uses the textbook. you basically have to teach yourself since she sets you up to pass, not succeed.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: As everyone else has mentioned, she is without a doubt the worst teacher I have ever encountered in my entire life. Don\'t make the mistake that we all did, looking back if I had the option to I would have dropped this class in a heartbeat. All work is out of the textbook and she lectures quickly and incomprehensibly. Good luck if you get her.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: This teacher is horrible! She has a very thick accent which makes her impossible to understand, her tests/quizzes are hard, she doesn\'t teach the material, just simply restates what\'s in the book. I\'m basically teaching myself the material. Avoid at all costs.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is very unclear and has a very incoherent teaching style. All lectures are straight from the powerpoint slides that the book supplied. Doesn\'t provide outside examples and if you have any questions regarding the material she redirects you to look for them in the book. STAY AWAY from this teacher if you can. Half of my class ended up dropping

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: This teacher is terrible! She is so incomprehensible that the class is almost pointless. She lectures the whole class time while the whole class sits on facebook. Do not take this class if you can get out of it, but if you are stuck with it then just teach yourself out of the book.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is pretty hard to understand, her tests are really hard, and she grades homework really hard. The final was really hard to study for.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Hard to understand. Grades weird. Not an enjoyable class in the least. You don\'t learn much and what you do learn has to be done on your own. Absolutely horrible.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: not a good teacher at all. she lectures everyday but no one comprehends or can pay attention during class. the tests are hard unless you study and teach yourself from the textbook. definitely not an easy a and i wouldn\'t take again unless you enjoy teaching yourself. no homework.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: unless you are prepared to do lots of studying outside of class do not take. however, if you are stuck in the class just study the textbook. Make sure you have a thourough understanding of the material before exams because lots of minor details are covered. two midterms together are 25%. Most important is the end of the class where the presentation

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: DO NOT TAKE THIS COURSE. THE TEACHER IS TERRIBLE. I AM SITTING IN HER CLASS AS I TYPE THIS, IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO PAY ATTENTION. ALL OTHER STUDENTS HAVE LAPTOP OPEN. DOESN\'T TEACH WHAT\'S ON HER MIDTERMS/TESTS. CANNOT UNDERSTAND HER EXTREMELYYYYY HEAVY ACCENT. BORING. LAME. WASTE OF MONEY. LEARNED 0. NOTHING. NADA.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: I took an econ class that said teacher: TBA. HUGE MISTAKE. Avoid at all costs! Can\'t Understand her accent at all. Says Jokes and gets mad that no one understood her. She Gives impossibly hard quizzes and midterms. I dropped the class after the midterm. The class was 65 min. long & had 160 questions (many of which were not covered at all). avoid!
